content.rendered:
We are looking for you!

Tiger BioSciences is looking for talented individuals!

Career Opportunities

At Tiger BioSciences, we believe in teamwork. We are passionate about progressing innovation by creating a culture of trust combined with a unified vision to improve patient outcomes through regenerative and restorative technology.

Why Tiger BioSciences?

Our team is our most valuable asset. We’re committed to providing a comprehensive benefits package to support you and your family, so you can bring your best to work every day. Explore how our Total Rewards empower your success both professionally and personally.

Quality Control Supervisor

Quality Control
The Quality Control Supervisor is responsible for overseeing quality control activities and ensuring that products or services meet both company and regulatory standards.

Marketing Product Manager, Dermatology

Marketing
The Marketing Product Manager of Dermatology will support strategic initiatives acting as a key driver in the development and execution of marketing strategies.

HR Generalist (m/f/d) - Part-time 50% to 80%

HR
Build and develop HR structures and processes.

Supply Chain Specialist (m/f/d)

Supply Chain
Manage and develop supply chain processes from procurement to delivery.

Vice President of Operations

Operations
The Vice President of Tiger Aesthetics Medical (TAM) Operations is responsible for operational scaling and efficiency generation for the TAM division.

Director of Quality Engineering

Quality Assurance
The Director of Quality Engineering is responsible for oversight of quality engineering activities in product development, lifecycle management, and quality tools and systems.

Director, IT Business Partner – Finance

Information Technology
We are seeking a strategic and hands-on IT Business Partner to lead the technology roadmap for our financial systems, with a strong focus on NetSuite.

Manager - IT Quality

Information Technology
We are seeking an experienced IT Quality Manager to lead and oversee the quality assurance efforts for our IT products and services, including both off-the-shelf solutions and custom-developed applications.

Director, IT Business Partner – Manufacturing & Supply Chain Management

Information Technology
We are seeking a results-driven Director, IT Business Partner to lead the digital transformation and optimization of our Manufacturing and Supply Chain systems.

Director, IT Business Partner – Sales & Marketing

Information Technology
We are seeking a strategic and hands-on IT Business Partner to lead the technology roadmap for our Sales and Marketing functions.

Aesthetics Territory Manager (Philadelphia, PA & New Jersey)

Sales
The Aesthetics Territory Manager responsibilities include presenting our products and services to potential clients.

Aesthetics Territory Manager (Cincinnati, OH & West Virginia)

Sales
The Aesthetics Territory Manager responsibilities include presenting our products and services to potential clients.

Senior Engineering Manager

Product Development
The Engineering manager will lead a Product Development team comprising of project engineers and product managers.

Associate Project Engineer (Medical Devices)

Product Development
The Associate Project Engineer will support the medical device team with the management and development of new and existing products.

Project Engineer Intern (Medical Devices)

Product Development
The Project Engineer Intern will support medical device team with existing and new products with development and management.

Director of Consumer Marketing (Tiger Aesthetics)

Manufacturing
The Tiger team is looking for a creative and dynamic Director of Consumer Marketing to help oversee a suite of existing brands as well as launch new, innovative products, ultimately driving consumer awareness, interest, and conversion.

Senior Sales Representative (Wound Care)

Sales
The Senior Sales Representative is responsible for driving company sales by continually identifying new sales opportunities and maintaining existing customer relationships.

Senior Manager, Marketing (alloClae)

Marketing-TAM
The alloClae team is looking for a creative and dynamic Senior Marketing Manager to help launch this innovative new product, driving consumer interest and physician loyalty.

Marketing Manager (dermaClae)

Marketing-TAM
The dermaClae team is looking for a creative and dynamic Marketing Manager to help launch this innovative new product, driving consumer interest and physician loyalty.

Remediation Engineer

Product Development
The Remediation Engineer will be responsible for identifying and resolving deficiencies in existing product documentation, particularly within Design History Files (DHFs), and product development processes to ensure compliance with regulatory standards and internal quality management systems.

Quality Control Supervisor

Operations
The Quality Control Supervisor leads the quality inspection team.

Quality Engineer

Quality-TAM
The Quality Engineer is primarily responsible for assuring product and Quality Systems quality and compliance through the development, implementation and monitoring of appropriate processes, tools, metrics, and goals.

Consignment Inventory Analyst

Commercial Operations - TAM
The Consignment Inventory Analyst at Tiger Aesthetics Medical is responsible for supporting the management of consignment and field inventory.

Project Engineer - Tissue

Product Development
The Project Engineer will support existing and new products with project management and development. This will include product management, prototyping, testing, and marketing associated with products.

Biostatistician

Research
The Biostatistician will support research on cell and tissue technologies through data analysis, study design, and statistical modeling.

Coordinator Support Associate (FT, rotating weekends)

Operations
Birth Tissue Recovery seeks a focused and detail-oriented individual to join our team in Charlotte, N.C., as a FULL-TIME ROTATING WEEKENDS Coordinator Support Associate.

Coordinator Support Associate (FT, rotating weekends)

Operations
Birth Tissue Recovery seeks a focused and detail-oriented individual to join our team in Winston Salem, N.C., as a FULL-TIME ROTATING WEEKENDS Coordinator Support Associate.

Coordinator Support Associate (FT, rotating weekends)

Operations
Birth Tissue Recovery seeks a focused and detail-oriented individual to join our team in Greensboro, N.C., as a FULL-TIME ROTATING WEEKENDS Coordinator Support Associate.

Director of Manufacturing

Manufactoring
The Director of Manufacturing is responsible for overseeing all manufacturing staff and all manufacturing activities to ensure continuity of production to support organizational goals.

Senior Project Engineer - Tissue

Research & Product Development
The Senior Project Engineer will be responsible for supporting existing products and the development of new products. This will include leading project management, product development, and verification & validation activities.

Senior Project Engineer - Medical Device

Research & Product Development
The Senior Project Engineer will be responsible for supporting existing products and the development of new products. This will include leading project management, product development, and verification & validation activities.

Engineering Manager - Tissue

Product Development
The Engineering manager will lead a Product Development team comprising of project engineers and product managers.

Project Engineer

Product Management
The Project Engineer will support existing and new products with project management and development.
